name: Fancy War：Adventurous Trip
description:
"Fancy War" - the first global heroes collection of idle mobile game. The cutest heroes of two-dimensional painting style will accompany you to the tour of the mysterious continent! You will see the cutest interface, rich cultivation system, easy and casual play method, exquisite pictures, the brisk music, exciting battle, gorgeous advanced, cool weapons, mysterious copy, the colorful plot and rich rewards. What are you waiting for? Now join the heroes of the the mysterious continent to take a risk and start to grow!

********************
